instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PPDCIN_G3H: What is PPDCIN_G3H? PPDCIN_G3H Is a power rail that comes directly from the laptop charger..

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Green Light
threads.message:
Guys, 
I get 12V on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> only if i the battery is plugged. 
I get 0 on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> with the charger.
The <SIGNAL>PPDCIN_G3H</SIGNAL> is present and i don't get green light.

Any hint from here?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Green Light
threads.message:
I just find out:
The problem is on L6995 have a short to ground. So i replaced and works fine.
thank you

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Green Light
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Green Light
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Green Light
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Green Light
threads.message:
Sometimes, actually many times, you get a board and then doesn't work. No Green light or won't turn on.
And then you put in your table and get a green light and the fan spin.
I don't know if i can call a magic, however, as far i know, this happen all the time.
